pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convert Files Between Markdown or R Markdown Files and Mind Maps // Convert Markdown ('.md') or R markdown ('.Rmd') files into mind map widgets or files ('.mm'), and vice versa. "FreeMind" mind map ('.mm') files can be opened by or imported to common mindmap software such as 'FreeMind' (http://freemind.sourceforge.net/wiki/index.php/Main_Page) and 'XMind' (http://www.xmind.net).
